meanings.sent1: The rare diamond outvalued all the other gems in the collection.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness outvalued any material possessions she owned.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's smile outvalued all the toys she received.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft outvalued any monetary reward.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset outvalued any painting in the gallery.

meanings.sent1: The new technology quickly outvalued the outdated model.
meanings.sent2: His hard work outvalued his natural talent in the long run.
meanings.sent3: The student's excuse for not doing homework outvalued all previous excuses.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outvalued any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread outvalued any store-bought loaf.
